name: mailchimp-add-note-to-subscriber
description: Adds a new note to an existing subscriber. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-member-notes/add-member-note/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

note.description: The content of the note. Note length is limited to 1,000 characters.

name: mailchimp-add-or-update-subscriber
description: Adds a new subscriber to an audience or updates existing subscriber. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-members/add-or-update-list-member/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

skipMergeValidation.description: If skip_merge_validation is true, member data will be accepted without merge field values, even if the merge field is usually required. This defaults to False.

statusIfNew.description: Subscriber's status. This value is required only if the email address is not already present on the list.

emailType.description: Type of email this member asked to get ('html' or 'text').

mergeFields.description: An individual merge var and value for a member.

interests.description: The key of this object's properties is the ID of the interest in question.

marketingPermissionId.description: The ID for the marketing permission on the list.

marketingPermissionsEnabled.description: If the subscriber has opted-in to the marketing permission.

ipSignup.description: IP address the subscriber signed up from.

timestampSignup.description: The date and time the subscriber signed up for the list in ISO 8601 format.

ipOpt.description: The IP address the subscriber used to confirm their opt-in status.

timestampOpt.description: The date and time the subscriber confirmed their opt-in status in ISO 8601 format.

name: mailchimp-add-remove-member-tags
description: Add or remove member tags. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-member-tags/add-or-remove-member-tags/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

name: mailchimp-add-segment-member
description: Adds a new member to a static segment. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-segment-members/add-member-to-segment/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

segmentId.description: The unique ID of the segment

name: mailchimp-add-subscriber-to-tag
description: Adds an email address to a tag within an audience. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-member-tags/add-or-remove-member-tags/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

name: mailchimp-create-campaign
description: Creates a new campaign draft. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/campaigns/add-campaign/)

type.description: There are four types of campaigns you can create in Mailchimp. A/B Split campaigns have been deprecated and variate campaigns should be used instead.

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

savedSegmentId.description: The ID for an existing saved segment.

prebuiltSegmentId.description: The prebuilt segment ID, if a prebuilt segment has been designated for this campaign.

subjectLine.description: The subject line for the campaign.

previewText.description: The preview text for the campaign.

fromName.description: The 'from' name on the campaign (not an email address).

replyTo.description: The reply-to email address for the campaign. Note: while this field is not required for campaign creation, it is required for sending.

useConversation.description: Use Mailchimp Conversation feature to manage out-of-office replies.

folderId.description: If the campaign is listed in a folder, the ID for that folder.

authenticate.description: Whether Mailchimp authenticated the campaign. Defaults to true.

autoFooter.description: Automatically append Mailchimp's default footer to the campaign.

inlineCss.description: Automatically inline the CSS included with the campaign content.

autoTweet.description: Automatically tweet a link to the campaign archive page when the campaign is sent.

autoFbPost.description: An array of Facebook page ID to auto-post to.

fbComments.description: Allows Facebook comments on the campaign (also force-enables the Campaign Archive toolbar). Defaults to true.

templateId.description: The ID of the template to use.

opens.description: Whether to track opens. Defaults to true. Cannot be set to false for variate campaigns.

htmlClicks.description: Whether to track clicks in the HTML version of the campaign. Defaults to true. Cannot be set to false for variate campaigns.

textClicks.description: Whether to track clicks in the plain-text version of the campaign. Defaults to true. Cannot be set to false for variate campaigns.

googleAnalytics.description: The custom slug for Google Analytics tracking (max of 50 bytes).

clicktale.description: The custom slug for ClickTale tracking (max of 50 bytes).

salesforceCampaign.description: Create a campaign in a connected Salesforce account.

salesforceNotes.description: Update contact notes for a campaign based on subscriber email addresses.

capsuleNotes.description: Update contact notes for a campaign based on subscriber email addresses. Must be using Mailchimp's built-in Capsule integration.

socialImageUrl.description: The url for the header image for the preview card.

socialDescritpion.description: A short summary of the campaign to display.

socialTitle.description: The title for the preview card. Typically the subject line of the campaign.

name: mailchimp-create-list
description: Creates a new list. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/lists/add-list/)

contactCompany.description: The company name for the list.

contactAddress1.description: The street address for the list contact.

contactCity.description: The city for the list contact.

contactCountry.description: A two-character ISO3166 country code. Defaults to US if invalid.

permissionReminder.description: The [permission reminder](https://mailchimp.com/help/edit-the-permission-reminder/) for the list. e.g You signed up for updates on our website

campaignDefaultsFromName.description: The default from name for campaigns sent to this list.

campaignDefaultsFromEmail.description: The default from email for campaigns sent to this list.

campaignDefaultsSubject.description: The default subject line for campaigns sent to this list.

campaignDefaultsLanguage.description: The default language for this lists's forms.

name: mailchimp-delete-campaign
description: Delete a specific campaign. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/campaigns/delete-campaign/)

name: mailchimp-delete-list
description: Deletes an existing list. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/lists)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

name: mailchimp-delete-list-member
description: Permanently deletes a member. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-members/delete-list-member/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

name: mailchimp-edit-campaign-template-content
description: Edits a defined content area of a custom HTML template. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/campaign-content/set-campaign-content/)

templateSections.description: Content for the sections of the template. Each key should be the unique mc:edit area name from the template.

plainText.description: The plain-text portion of the campaign. If left unspecified, we'll generate this automatically.

html.description: The plain-text portion of the campaign. If left unspecified, we'll generate this automatically.

url.description: When importing a campaign, the URL where the HTML lives.

name: mailchimp-get-campaign
description: Gets metadata of a specific campaign. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/campaigns/get-campaign-info/)

name: mailchimp-get-a-campaign-report
description: Gets a campaign report. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/campaign-advice/)

name: mailchimp-get-list
description: Searches for lists. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/lists/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

includeTotalContacts.description: Return the total_contacts field in the stats response, which contains an approximate count of all contacts in any state.

name: mailchimp-get-list-activities
description: Retrieves up to the previous 180 days of daily detailed aggregated activity stats for a list. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-activity/list-recent-activity/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

name: mailchimp-get-list-member-activity
description: Get the last 50 events of a member's activity on a specific list. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-activity/view-recent-activity-50/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

subscriberHash.description: The MD5 hash of the lowercase version of the list member's email address. This endpoint also accepts a list member's email address or contact_id.

action.description: A comma separated list of actions to return. Possible values: abuse, bounce, click, open, sent, unsub, or ecomm.

name: mailchimp-get-list-member-tags
description: Retrieves a list of all member tags. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-member-tags/list-member-tags/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

name: mailchimp-list-segment-member
description: Retrieves a list of all segment members. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-segment-members/list-members-in-segment/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

name: mailchimp-remove-segment-member
description: Removes a member from the specified static segment. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-segment-members/remove-list-member-from-segment/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

name: mailchimp-search-campaign
description: Searches for the campaigns. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/search-campaigns/search-campaigns/)

query.description: Search query text used to filter results.

name: mailchimp-search-lists
description: Searches for lists. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/lists/)

beforeDateCreated.description: Restrict response to lists created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

sinceDateCreated.description: Restrict results to lists created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

beforeCampaignLastSent.description: Restrict results to lists created before the last campaign send date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

sinceCampaignLastSent.description: Restrict results to lists created after the last campaign send date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

email.description: Restrict results to lists that include a specific subscriber's email address.

sortField.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field. Possible value: "date_created"

sortDir.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results. Possible values: ASC or DESC.

hasEcommerceStore.description: The unique ID for the list

includeTotalContacts.description: Return the total_contacts field in the stats response, which contains an approximate count of all contacts in any state.

query.description: The search query used to filter results. Query should be a valid email, or a string representing a contact's first or last name.

listId.description: The unique ID for the list.

name: mailchimp-send-campaign
description: Sends a campaign draft to the audience signed up for the campaign. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/campaigns/send-campaign/)

name: mailchimp-unsubscribe-email
description: Unsubscribe an email address from an audience. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/list-members/archive-list-member/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

name: mailchimp-update-campaign
description: Update a campaign. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/campaigns/update-campaign-settings/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

savedSegmentId.description: The ID for an existing saved segment.

prebuiltSegmentId.description: The prebuilt segment ID, if a prebuilt segment has been designated for this campaign.

subjectLine.description: The subject line for the campaign.

previewText.description: The preview text for the campaign.

fromName.description: The 'from' name on the campaign (not an email address).

replyTo.description: The reply-to email address for the campaign. Note: while this field is not required for campaign creation, it is required for sending.

useConversation.description: Use Mailchimp Conversation feature to manage out-of-office replies.

folderId.description: If the campaign is listed in a folder, the ID for that folder.

authenticate.description: Whether Mailchimp authenticated the campaign. Defaults to true.

autoFooter.description: Automatically append Mailchimp's default footer to the campaign.

inlineCss.description: Automatically inline the CSS included with the campaign content.

autoTweet.description: Automatically tweet a link to the campaign archive page when the campaign is sent.

autoFbPost.description: An array of Facebook page ID to auto-post to.

fbComments.description: Allows Facebook comments on the campaign (also force-enables the Campaign Archive toolbar). Defaults to true.

templateId.description: The ID of the template to use.

opens.description: Whether to track opens. Defaults to true. Cannot be set to false for variate campaigns.

htmlClicks.description: Whether to track clicks in the HTML version of the campaign. Defaults to true. Cannot be set to false for variate campaigns.

textClicks.description: Whether to track clicks in the plain-text version of the campaign. Defaults to true. Cannot be set to false for variate campaigns.

googleAnalytics.description: The custom slug for Google Analytics tracking (max of 50 bytes).

clicktale.description: The custom slug for ClickTale tracking (max of 50 bytes).

salesforceCampaign.description: Create a campaign in a connected Salesforce account.

salesforceNotes.description: Update contact notes for a campaign based on subscriber email addresses.

capsuleNotes.description: Update contact notes for a campaign based on subscriber email addresses. Must be using Mailchimp's built-in Capsule integration.

socialImageUrl.description: The url for the header image for the preview card.

socialDescritpion.description: A short summary of the campaign to display.

socialTitle.description: The title for the preview card. Typically the subject line of the campaign.

name: mailchimp-update-list
description: Updates an existing list. [See docs here](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/api/lists/update-lists/)

listId.description: The unique ID of the list

contactCompany.description: The company name for the list.

contactAddress1.description: The street address for the list contact.

contactCity.description: The city for the list contact.

contactState.description: The state for the list contact.

contactCountry.description: A two-character ISO3166 country code. Defaults to US if invalid.

contactPhone.description: The phone number for the list contact.

contactZip.description: The postal or zip code for the list contact.

campaignDefaultsFromName.description: The default from name for campaigns sent to this list.

campaignDefaultsFromEmail.description: The default from email for campaigns sent to this list.

campaignDefaultsSubject.description: The default subject line for campaigns sent to this list.

campaignDefaultsLanguage.description: The default language for this lists's forms.

emailTypeOption.description: Whether the list supports [multiple formats for emails](https://mailchimp.com/help/change-audience-name-defaults/).
